item.title: How to make some items respawnable (Broken code)
item.dc:creator: @tidus44 tidus44
item.description:
@tidus44 wrote:

Hey guys! I’ve been working on my new 508, and i’ve run across a problem…
I’ve tried to fix it myself. But it’s just not working. I want EVERYONE to be able to spawn. But some items are unspawnable.

if (cmd[0].equals("item") && p.rights = 0) { int itemId = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); if (p.rights <= 1) { /*if(itemId == 6570) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn a Fire Cape."); p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0); return; }*/ /*if(itemId == 11694 || itemId == 11702) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn Armadyl items, please get them from godwars."); p.frames.playSound(p, 4039, 1, 0); return; }*/

Read full topic
